alert.note: Alert for Hill (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 1:40PM MDT until June 05 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hill County in north central Montana... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 140 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 23 miles north of Beaver Creek, or 23 miles north of Havre, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Hill County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
